headline.main: When the Afghans Are Free of War

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Taliban Lose Grip on Wider Regions; Fighting in South'' (front page, Nov. 15): Most feminist leaders have been uneasy if not disapproving of America's invasion of Afghanistan. They cannot bring themselves to congratulate President Bush and the American military on their swift and decisive actions against the Taliban. Let me do so.
